original_title: First to the Top of the World
overview: In 1967, a team of explorers with no experience with polar ice travel attempted to reach the North Pole. Film, audio diaries and interviews reveal the extraordinary details of this incredibleâ€¦  In 1967, a team of amateur explorers rewrote the history books by becoming the first people to reach the North Pole. They documented their trip on film and audio diaries.
title: First to the Top of the World
